file.name: channel-site-map.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.1
info:
  title: Adzerk Management API - Channel Site Maps
  description: Advertiser related Adzerk Management API
  version: '1.0'
servers:
  - url: 'https://api.adzerk.net'
tags:
  - name: channel-site-map
    description: Manage Channel/Site Maps
paths:
  /v1/channelSite:
    post:
      tags:
        - channel-site-map
      operationId: create
      security:
        - ApiKeyAuth: []
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              type: object
              required:
                - siteId
                - channelId
              properties:
                siteId:
                  type: integer
                  format: int32
                channelId:
                  type: integer
                  format: int32
                priority:
                  type: integer
                  format: int32
      responses:
        200:
          description: The newly created Channel/Site Map
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: './schemas/channel-site-map.yaml#/schemas/ChannelSiteMap'
    get:
      tags:
        - channel-site-map
      operationId: list
      security:
        - ApiKeyAuth: []
      parameters:
        - name: pageSize
          in: query
          description: The size of the page to be returned
          required: false
          schema:
            type: integer
            format: int32
            nullable: true
            default: 500
        - name: page
          in: query
          description: The page number to be returned
          required: false
          schema:
            type: integer
            format: int32
            nullable: true
      responses:
        200:
          description: A paged list of Channel/Site Maps
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: './schemas/channel-site-map.yaml#/schemas/ChannelSiteMapList'
    put:
      tags:
        - channel-site-map
      operationId: update
      security:
        - ApiKeyAuth: []
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              type: object
              required:
                - siteId
                - channelId
                - priority
              properties:
                siteId:
                  type: integer
                  format: int32
                channelId:
                  type: integer
                  format: int32
                priority:
                  type: integer
                  format: int32
      responses:
        200:
          description: The updated Channel/Site Map
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: './schemas/channel-site-map.yaml#/schemas/ChannelSiteMap'
  '/v1/channel/{channelId}/site/{siteId}':
    get:
      tags:
        - channel-site-map
      operationId: get
      security:
        - ApiKeyAuth: []
      parameters:
        - name: channelId
          in: path
          description: The Channel Id
          required: true
          schema:
            type: integer
            format: int32
        - name: siteId
          in: path
          description: The Site Id
          required: true
          schema:
            type: integer
            format: int32
      responses:
        200:
          description: The Channel/Site Map
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: './schemas/channel-site-map.yaml#/schemas/ChannelSiteMap'
  '/v1/channelsInSite/{siteId}':
    get:
      tags:
        - channel-site-map
      operationId: listChannelsForSite
      security:
        - ApiKeyAuth: []
      parameters:
        - name: siteId
          in: path
          description: The Site Id
          required: true
          schema:
            type: integer
            format: int32
      responses:
        200:
          description: A list of Channel Ids
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: './schemas/channel-site-map.yaml#/schemas/ChannelList'
  '/v1/channel/{channelId}/site/{siteId}/delete':
    get:
      tags:
        - channel-site-map
      operationId: delete
      security:
        - ApiKeyAuth: []
      parameters:
        - name: channelId
          in: path
          description: The Channel Id
          required: true
          schema:
            type: integer
            format: int32
        - name: siteId
          in: path
          description: The Site Id
          required: true
          schema:
            type: integer
            format: int32
      responses:
        200:
          description: Successfully Deleted
components:
  securitySchemes:
    $ref: './components/security-schemes.yaml#/components/securitySchemes'

Error:
unmarshal: yaml: unmarshal errors:
  yaml: line 185: cannot unmarshal !!str `./compo...` into ogen.SecurityScheme
